title: pls rito allow us to set smart casts on each champion
body: Im sure Im not the only one who feels this way I dont like having all my smart casts turned on and which ones I turn on are different for every champion

replies.body:
Yeah but it takes like 5 seconds to make changes to your smart cast settings though.

I would rather make changes every time when I need to, rather than trying to remember which setting I use on who last time I played him/her.

really you dont know what abilities you would want smart cast example on graves i know i would want my q and e smart cast i wouldnt need to remember 
and its not really about the time or inconvenience of chaning it i just sometimes forget and it screws me up early
